Primary Contact: Kris Stewart, CEO and Clinical Director; Email: clinicaldirector@advancedhomecaresolutions.com
Service Details: - Offers services that include personal care, palliative care, live-in caregiving, night attendants - Provides home support services such as companionship, driving, housekeeping, grounds keeping and home repairs - Provides professional services that include Licenced Practical Nurses, Registered Nurses, and Foot Care Nurses - Provides Professional Geriatric Care Management packages, and provides Secure Call-Basic and Secure Call Plus - All staff have had RCMP criminal record checks - Offers an online "Family Room" where families may see care tasks completed and listen to voice messages from the caregivers
